data.text:
Do You Want To Be My Girlfriend Do you wanna be my girlfriend Do you wanna lay around with me Around with me Do you wanna go to a movie Sit in the back row and make out Make out with me I wanna know when I think about you Do ya think about me too Do you wanna be my girlfriend Hold hands n′ hang around the mall Around the mall Do you know you drive me crazy Whenever you come out to play Come out to play I wanna know when I think about you Do you think about me too I won't give up until I′ve got you Gimme some time Do ya wanna be my girlfriend C'mon and hang around with me Around with me I wanna know when I think about you Do you think about me too Writer(s): See Spot Run
